channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 17:09 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 17:09 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:06 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
